entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 04:13 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.3°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -11.1°C
Wind: NNE 18 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
